overview: Shashi Agarwal is a genius who is working on computer since class 3rd. He is an expert in web site designing & search engine optimization. His unique talent is in PHP + MySQL, expertise in this makes him distinct from others at his age. He has designed numerous web sites (both dynamic & static). He has also developed numerous Content Management Systems and customized various Open Source User Interface for being used by companies & individuals.
